did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Mail order brides and international dating collection, circa 1990-1994.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letters, photographs, catalogs, membership materials, instructions, rules, numerous "profiles" and other documents relating to mail order brides and other international match-making services spanning from 1987 to 1998. About a third of the archive by volume consists of catalogs, order forms and other promotional material from a variety of companies, including "Compatibility Unlimited", "Scanna International" and "Latin Connections". Many of these documents are marked by holograph notations, particularly at photographs, indicating women with whom he'd like to correspond. The selection of correspondence and photographs show a wide variety of backgrounds, with letters from women from Australia to Peru, some even in their native languages. Also include some documents relating to court cases and restraining orders.

bioghist.p: Personal archive of an anonymous man's search for love.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Letters, photographs, catalogs, membership materials, instructions, rules, numerous "profiles" and other documents relating to mail order brides and other international match-making services spanning from 1987 to 1998. About a third of the archive by volume consists of catalogs, order forms and other promotional material from a variety of companies, including "Compatibility Unlimited", "Scanna International" and "Latin Connections". Many of these documents are marked by holograph notations, particularly at photographs, indicating women with whom he'd like to correspond. The selection of correspondence and photographs show a wide variety of backgrounds, with letters from women from Australia to Peru, some even in their native languages. Also include some documents relating to court cases and restraining orders.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Folder 2 in Box 1 contains correspondence that is restricted until 2066.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Mail order brides and international dating collection, #7842. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Issues of Cherry Blossoms have been cataloged separately as part of the Human Sexuality Collection.
